topic.title: <RibbonTab>
topic.p:
<RibbonTab/> is a <Tab/> with two more properties:
BeforeHeaders: A composition as a container that is put before tab page headers.
AfterHeaders: A composition as a container that is put after tab page headers.
Multiple <RibbonTabPage/> are expected in its Pages property.
Usually, a <RibbonTab/> is put on the top of a window.
